py-vars-01.title: Python Variables
py-vars-01.overview: Variables bind names to values. Think of them as labeled boxes for data.

exercises.prompt: Create a variable named age and assign it 21.
exercises.rubric: We expect a variable called age whose value is an integer.

exercises.prompt: Create a variable called name and assign it a string (your name).
exercises.rubric: We expect a variable called name whose value is a string.

py-func-01.title: Python Functions
py-func-01.overview: Functions package reusable logic. Use `return` to send a value back.
py-func-01.example:
def add(a, b):
    return a + b

result = add(2, 3)
print(result)

exercises.prompt: Write a function greet(name) that returns 'Hello, <name>!'
exercises.rubric: We expect a function greet that returns a string using the argument.
